title: Tonight's Kickoff
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if they are more confident in the Bills or the Rams this season, if the Yankees need to sign Judge at any cost and Steve Young joins the show for 5 Good Minutes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: The NFL season kicks off tonight and Steve Young joins for 5 Good Minutes.
